caption: Table 1. Important hyperparameter values for m-BERT fine-tuning and evaluation.

Table 2. Results of evaluation on test set variants of translated SQuAD dataset (dataset 5.1) for each fine-tune 
setup, compared against benchmark results [Gupta et al. 2019]. All values are averaged across results on 10 
checkpoints. The highest score in each evaluation category is highlighted for ease of comparison.
